entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Lake Airport 02:48 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
